item.description:
Award-winning children's musician and Natick mom Stacey Peasley will be performing a concert for Mothers & More! Join us on the dance floor at Whitney Place for singing and dancing to classic songs, contemporary kids' hits, and Stacey's original songs. This event is open to both members and non-members of Mothers & More. Snacks and drinks will be provided. This is a free event, sponsored by Mothers & More.

Stacey Peasley's website: http://www.staceypeasley.com/

Directions to Whitney Place, Natick MA: http://www.salmonhealthandretirement.com/wp-content/uploads/Newest-Natick-Direction-Sheet.pdf

Questions? Please visit our website, www.metrowestmothersandmore.org/
item.name: Stacey Peasley Concert!
